Description: Up for consideration is this Epiphone Bluehawk Deluxe electric guitar. It is pre-owned and does have some cosmetic wear, but it is in good, playing condition. This guitar is regularly inspected by our in-house guitar tech(s). This is a “MIRC” used guitar and is in great, clean condition.
